DataJoint using data relationally in the science lab

DataJoint for MATLAB and Python is a high-level programming interface for MySQL databases to support data processing chains in science labs. DataJoint is built on the foundation of the relational data model and prescribes a consistent method for organizing, populating, and querying data.

This blog contains relevant news, code examples, and discussions.
